definition: Bamboo Annals, early chronicle of Chinese ancient history, written c. 300 BC

sentences.english: In the lunar calendar, the years are designated by the Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches.
It was the first time that a large steel incense burner made by marquis tang government office with inscriptions were found in nanyang.
sentences.chinese: 南陽首次發現有銘文紀年和唐王府鑄造的大型鐵香爐。

sentences.english: The Chinese animal signs are a 12-year cycle used for dating the years.
sentences.chinese: 十二屬相就是用來紀年的一個十二年的循環。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, when did the way of numbering the years with Gan-Zhi start, different people have different versions.
sentences.chinese: 但，從什麼時候開始以干支來紀年卻有不同說法。

sentences.english: The Bane of Kree was a barbarian conqueror who lived during the Age of Legends.
sentences.chinese: 克里之災是生活在傳奇紀年的一個野蠻的征服者。

sentences.english: In contemporary, New Year's day, refers to the Christian era at the first day.
sentences.chinese: 在當代，元旦指公元紀年的歲首第一天。

sentences.english: Guyu Following the Yellow Emperor of the industry, when the Yellow Emperor was born to reign for personal use only.
sentences.chinese: 故欲繼黃帝之業，當自用黃帝降生爲紀年始。

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese people invented the method to designate the years by the Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches.
sentences.chinese: 中國古人發明了用“干支”紀年的方法。

definition: oracle inscriptions of the Shang Dynasty (16th-11th century BC) on tortoiseshells or animal bones
to transcribe/to make a fair copy
to mark a text with dots and circles/to punctuate
History of the Liao Dynasty, twenty first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed under Toktoghan 脫脫|脱脱[Tuo1 tuo1] in 1345 during the Yuan Dynasty 元[Yuan2], 116 scrolls
Ji Yun (1724-1805), Qing Dynasty writer, author of supernatural novel Notes on a Minutely Observed Thatched Hut 閱微草堂筆記|阅微草堂笔记
to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
reign title/era name (name for either the entire reign of an emperor or one part of it)/year number (such as 2016 or 甲子)
reign name (1909-1911) of the last Qing emperor Pu Yi 溥儀|溥仪
History of the Former Han Dynasty, second of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed by Ban Gu 班固[Ban1 Gu4] in 82 during Eastern Han (later Han), 100 scrolls
